com.github.lucbui.pipeline

Interface ReadPipe<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DoublePipe<T>, PointerFieldFriendlyDoublePipe, PointerFieldFriendlyReadPipe
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AfterReadPipe, ForEachPipe, OffsetFieldPipe, OffsetParsePipe, PaletteFieldPipe, PrintPipe, SetFieldPipe, SpriteFieldPipe, SwitchPipe

    public interface ReadPipe<T>
    A pipe which modifies an object, through usage of a HexFieldIterator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void read(T object, HexFieldIterator iterator, HexFramework hexFramework)
      Modify an instance of an object, using a HexFieldIterator

        Modify an instance of an object, using a HexFieldIterator
